channel.title: 4 deltascape commands
channel.description:
Ok how could i make in deltascape a ::quests command? that gives you all the quests done?
Secondly a ::xrichie command
3rdly a ::runes
EDIT: a ::pure command
Thanks in advance

item.title: 4 deltascape commands
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

thanks i hope 100% that you don’t fail in life

Read full topic

item.title: 4 deltascape commands
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quest") && playerRights >= 2) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); sendQuest("@greDesert Treasure", 7334); sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336); sendQuest("@gre@Monkey Madness", 7383); sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer", 7339); sendQuest("@gre@Legends Quest", 7338); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); sendQuest("@gre@Knight's Legend", 7346); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Spirit", 7341); sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xrichie") && playerRights >= 2) { addItem(999999999, 995); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes") && playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 553; i <= 566; i++) { addItem(5000000, i); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 2) { for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { if (i != 1 && i!= 5) addSkillXP(15000000, i); } }

Read full topic

item.title: 4 deltascape commands
item.dc:creator: @legend_the_hero legend the hero
item.description:
@legend_the_hero wrote:

would this work as my ::xrichie code?

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“xrichie”))&& playerRights >= 2) {

	addItem(999999999, 995);
}

Or would it fail epicly?

Read full topic

item.title: 4 deltascape commands
item.dc:creator: @lool121 lool121
item.description:
@lool121 wrote:

First ::quest is taking me too much time, here u go with the others…

All of those commands are MOD+!

::xrichie…

if (command.startsWith("xrichie") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(995, 2000000000); }
Gives u 2000m.

::runes…

if (command.startsWith("runes") && playerRights >= 1) { addItem(560, 90000000); addItem(565, 90000000); addItem(554, 90000000); addItem(555, 90000000); addItem(561, 90000000); addItem(556, 90000000); addItem(557, 90000000); addItem(562, 90000000); addItem(566, 90000000); addItem(4278, 90000000); }
First 4 runes are for barrage. (czar).

::pure…

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("N33b!."); }

[b]- Lool121.

Read full topic

item.title: 4 deltascape commands
item.dc:creator: @Trigger1 Trigger*
item.description:
@Trigger1 wrote:

Okay good now I could help you.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("quest")) { q1 = 15; q2 = 15; q3 = 15; q4 = 15; q5 = 15; q6 = 15; q7 = 15; q8 = 15; q9 = 15; q10 = 15; q11 = 15; sendQuest("@gre@Lost City", 7332); sendQuest("@gre@Rune Mysteries", 7333); sendQuest("@greDesert Treasure", 7334); sendQuest("@gre@Vampire Slayer", 7336); sendQuest("@gre@Monkey Madness", 7383); sendQuest("@gre@Sheep Shearer", 7339); sendQuest("@gre@Legends Quest", 7338); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Diplomacy", 7340); sendQuest("@gre@Knight's Legend", 7346); sendQuest("@gre@Lunar Spirit", 7341); sendQuest("@gre@The Wolf's Cure", 7342); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("xrichie")) { addItem(999999999, 995); } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes")) { for (int i = 553; i <= 566; i++) { addItem(5000000, i); } } if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { for (int i = 0; i < 22; i++) { if (i != 1 && i!= 5) addSkillXP(15000000, i); } }
